definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to level/to raze to the ground
towering buildings are built up from the ground (idiom)/great oaks from little acorns grow
pinyin: wan4 zhang4 gao1 lou2 ping2 di4 qi3

definition: Nanping district (old term)/since 1983, Nanping county level city, Fujian

sentences.english: High buildings rise from the flat ground.
The boulders suddenly disappeared, giving way to a stretch of plain.
sentences.chinese: 突然大石块不见了，前面是一片平地。

sentences.english: The high, flat mountaintop is covered with many green juniper and pinon pine trees.
sentences.chinese: 在高高的山顶有一块被杜松和矮松覆盖的平地。

sentences.english: Moreover, the invention also discloses a horizontal control method for a grader .
sentences.chinese: 另外，本发明还公开了一种平地机的水平控制方法。

sentences.english: Massive 9)tremors have brought down entire cities in this part of the world.
sentences.chinese: 大地震曾把这一地区的城市夷为平地。

sentences.english: To assure the purity of Akhal-Teke horses entered into races.
sentences.chinese: 保证参加平地赛马的阿哈马出生来源的纯度。

sentences.english: The best rice land is level, conveniently diked for alternating irrigation and drainage.
sentences.chinese: 稻田最好是在平地上，筑田埂以利排灌。

sentences.english: A business offering true honest service might be unfairly hurt.
sentences.chinese: 提供真诚服务的商店会不公平地受损。

sentences.english: The highlight of the day was stopping at Bonneville Salt Flats International Speedway.
sentences.chinese: 最突出的一天是停在巴纳维亚盐带平地国际赛道。

sentences.english: Between 15% and 20% of global warming pollution is caused by the razing of forests.
sentences.chinese: 把森林夷为平地导致15%至20%全球变暖污染。

sentences.english: In 1974 Darwin was devastated by Cyclone Tracy.
sentences.chinese: 1974年达尔文被热带气旋特蕾西夷为平地。

sentences.english: The world trade building was razed to the ground in the big explosion yesterday…
sentences.chinese: 大厦在昨天的大爆炸中被夷为平地。

sentences.english: They need a big tsunami to take out their little sand forts.
sentences.chinese: 来一场海啸把他们的小沙堡夷为平地。

sentences.english: Mainly manages Chang Linpai the car loader, the bulldozer, the road roller.
sentences.chinese: 主要经营常林牌装载机，压路机，平地机。

sentences.english: I'll raze this place to hell!
sentences.chinese: 我会把这里给夷为平地。

sentences.english: The earth-quake laid the city flat.

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
sandy beach or river bank/sand dune/sandy land
